mapper.select: select c.id, c.name, corporation,tel, registeredcaptial, registeredtime, t.name tname from _company c left join _type t on c.tid=t.id order by c.id
select *, t.name tname from _company c left join _type t on c.tid=t.id where c.id=#{id} order by c.id
select count(aid),a.name from _company c join _area a on c.aid=a.id group by a.id

select count(*) as count,level from( select (case when registeredcaptial < 1000000 then 'LEVEL1' when registeredcaptial>=1000000 and registeredcaptial<2000000 then 'LEVEL2' when registeredcaptial>=2000000 and registeredcaptial<3000000 then 'LEVEL3' when registeredcaptial>=3000000 then 'LEVEL4' end ) as level from _company ) a group by level
select count(id),substr(registeredtime,0,8) as time from _company group by time order by time
